feedbacks.message: I like the new features on #facebook, but the app crashes frequently on my phone. Please fix it! #facebook
The coffee at my local #dunkin has been inconsistent lately. Some days it's perfect, others it's not. #dunkin
Since yday on mobile #apple keeps buffering the video, it keeps happening even when I redownload the app. I'm in an area with decent internet btw. #apple
The new #burgerking menu items are really good, but the service at my local outlet has been very slow lately. #burgerking
The #honda service center was great, but they didn't have the parts I needed. Had to wait for them to order. #honda
Love the new #cocacola ad campaign, but I miss some of the old flavors. Please bring them back! #cocacola
Had an issue with a #etsy seller and customer service was great. However, it took too long to resolve. #etsy
Happy with my #jpmorgan account overall, but the mobile app could use some improvements. #jpmorgan
The search results on #google have been less relevant recently. Any plans to improve this? #google
Using #ibm cloud services has been a positive experience, but their documentation can be confusing. #ibm
